description: Amendments to planning permission dated 07 January 2025 (RN: 24/02202/FULL) for, 'Alteration, extension and refurbishment of existing office buildings at 68-71 Newman Street and 9 -12 Berners Mews as part of their reunification, demolition of existing structure at level 6 at Newman Street, erection of a two storey roof extension set back from the parapet provisioning additional office floorspace (Class E) and installation of roof plant and lift overrun, and horizontal extensions to existing office floorplates, infilling of lightwell, reprovision of terraces, alongside alterations to existing elevations including replacement windows and associated works, the relocation of the entrance at ground floor level on Newman Street, alongside the delivery of cycle parking and end of trip facilities, and all associated and ancillary works'; NAMELY, to allow reconfiguration of South Fire Escape Stair and associated amendments to roof level and railings; Lift overrun height increased by 145mm to accommodate structural requirements; omission of railing to Level 5 and 6 Newman Street Fa√ßade; window transom heights adjusted and openable sections added to windows; Ventilation Louvre added on Berners Mews 4th floor facade; Decorative perforated screen extends to include fire escape door, providing continuity in facade; Berners Mews GF stall riser height increased to accommodate smoke vents at low level; amendments to facade, parapet heights and set backs around North stair core from L6 to RF; upper Roof Terrace lobby structure cut back; and textured PPC aluminium for the Berners Mews L3 only.
